database.name: nr
database.detail: The nucleotide collection consists of GenBank+EMBL+DDBJ+PDB+RefSeq sequences, but excludes EST, STS, GSS, WGS, TSA,patent sequences as well as phase 0, 1, and 2 HTGS sequences. The database is partially non-redundant. In some cases identical sequences have been merged into one entry, while preserving the accession, GI, title and taxonomy information for each entry. Merged sequences include GenBank and RefSeq entries with identical sequences. Sequences added to the database since April, 2011 have also been merged with identical existing entries.

database.name: refseq_rna
database.detail: RNA entries from NCBI's Reference Sequence project.

database.name: refseq_genomic
database.detail: Genomic entries from NCBI's Reference Sequence project.

database.name: chromosome
database.detail: NCBI Chromosome Sequences

database.name: est
database.detail: Database of GenBank+EMBL+DDBJ sequences from EST Divisions.

database.name: est_human
database.detail: Human subset of EST.

database.name: est_mouse
database.detail: Mouse subset of EST.

database.name: est_others
database.detail: Subset of est other than human or mouse.

database.name: gss
database.detail: Genome Survey Sequence, includes single-pass genomic data, exon-trapped sequences, and Alu PCR sequences.

database.name: htgs
database.detail: Unfinished High Throughput Genomic Sequences: phases 0, 1 and 2.

database.name: pat
database.detail: Nucleotides from the Patent division of GenBank.

database.name: pdb
database.detail: This database consists of sequences from the Protein Data Bank (PDB), which contains information about experimentally-determined structures of proteins, nucleic acids, and complex assemblies.

database.name: alu
database.detail: alu repeat elements.

database.name: dbsts
database.detail: Database of GenBank+EMBL+DDBJ sequences from STS Divisions.

database.name: wgs
database.detail: This database consists of Whole Genome Shotgun (WGS) contigs, but excludes chromosomes associated with WGS projects. Entrez query limits not available on this database

database.name: env_nt
database.detail: Nucleotide sequences from WGS environmental samples, including those from Sargasso Sea and Mine Drainage projects.

database.name: tsa_nt
database.detail: The Transcriptome Shotgun Assembly (TSA) database is an archive of computationally assembled mRNA sequences from primary data such as EST and raw sequence reads. See https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/genbank/TSA.html for details.

database.name: nr
database.detail: All non-redundant GenBank CDS translations+ PDB + SwissProt + PIR + PRF excluding environmental samples from WGS projects.

database.name: refseq_protein
database.detail: RefSeq protein sequences from NCBI's Reference Sequence Project.

database.name: swissprot
database.detail: Non-redundant UniProtKB/SwissProt sequences.

database.name: pat
database.detail: Protein sequences derived from the Patent division of GenBank

database.name: pdb
database.detail: This database consists of sequences from the Protein Data Bank (PDB), which contains information about experimentally-determined structures of proteins, nucleic acids, and complex assemblies.

database.name: env_nr
database.detail: Proteins from WGS metagenomic projects.

database.name: tsa_nr
database.detail: The Transcriptome Shotgun Assembly proteins are produced from CDS features on mRNA sequences in the Transcriptome Shotgun Assembly sequences. See https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/genbank/TSA.html for details.
